types:type.name: person
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type person = Array<{| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, firstname: String, lastname: String, date_of_birth: String, address: String, age: Number {"typeId": "int"}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"id\\\":1,\\\"firstname\\\":\\\"Souheil\\\",\\\"lastname\\\":\\\"Ben Slama\\\",\\\"date_of_birth\\\":\\\"1999-05-06\\\",\\\"address\\\":\\\"1999-05-06\\\",\\\"age\\\":23}]"}

types:type.name: names
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type names = {| users: Array<{| name: String |}> |} {"example": "{\\\"users\\\":[{\\\"name\\\":\\\"Name 1\\\"},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"Name 2\\\"}]}"}
